mapper.select: SELECT C.cartid, C.productid, C.cartamount, P.productname, P.parentproductname, C.cartprice, P.productprice, P.company, P.stock, P.prodimgurl, P.isthumbnail, (SELECT discountpercent FROM membergrade WHERE gradeid = (SELECT grade FROM member WHERE memberid = #{memberId})) AS discountpercent FROM cart C JOIN productoriginal P ON C.cartid = P.cartid WHERE P.memberid = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(productid, memberid, cartamount, cartprice) VALUES (#{productId}, #{memberId}, #{cartAmount}, (SELECT productPrice FROM product WHERE productid = #{productId}))
